definitions.body: row, course of building-stones, in temple and in Solomon's house 1Ki 6:36, 1Ki 7:12; forming enclosures in corner of court Ez Eze 46:23; of beams 1Ki 6:36, 1Ki 7:12, v. also 1Ki 7:4 (Th Klo, v. [[שֶׁקֶף]], [[שְׁקֻפִים]]); of pillars 1Ki 7:2, 1Ki 7:3.

row of jewels, on high priest's breast-piece Ex 28:17, Ex 28:17, Ex 28:17, Ex 28:18, Ex 28:19, Ex 28:20, Ex 39:10, Ex 39:10, Ex 39:10, Ex 39:11, Ex 39:12, Ex 39:13 (all P); of pomegranates on capitals of pillars in temple 1Ki 7:20, 1Ki 7:42, 2Ch 4:13, so also prob. 1Ki 7:18, v. Th Klo, after LXX; of knops round the molten sea 1Ki 7:24, cf. 2Ch 4:3 (oxen [[הַבָּקָר]], erron. for [[הַפְּקָעִים]] 1Ki 7:24).
